Title: Silverlight Deep Linking with error handling
Description: This project demonstrates Silverlight Deep Linking with error handling.
HomeWiki:
This project demonstrates Silverlight Deep Linking and provides two solutions for handling errors:

1. Using a custom error template page
2. Using an error popup (Child Window)

For step by step guide for both options and to see the live demo go to http://www.silverlighttips.com/?tag=/deep+linking.

If you experience any issues related to this project or have any question please the specific thread I created for this project on Silverlight Forums here: http://www.silverlightforums.com/showthread.php?p=1849#post1849.
